posts.post_content:
Currently looking for portraits of both common players and hofers I dont have, which is a large percentage of the set. I have some action and portrait dups available.

Looking for trades in similar value and grades whether it's 1 for 1 or 1 for 4. Let me know what you need. PM me your email and I'll send scans.

T206s I have:
Heinie Wagner bat right shoulder SC SGC 3.5
Hunky Shaw SC SGC 3
Al Shaw St. Louis Hindu PSA 1.5
Admiral Schlei Portrait OM SGC 4
Rube Oldring Fielding Piedmont SGC 3
Harry Niles Piedmont SGC 3
Rube Kroh Polar Bear SGC 3
Rube Kisinger Piedmont SGC 3 
Bill Carrigan Piedmont PSA 2.5
T206 HOFers I have:
Miller Huggins Portrait Piedmont PSA 1
John McGraw Portrait no cap Piedmont PSA 1
